description: The Case Logic UNZB-2 Compact Camera Case (Black) is compatible with ultra compact cameras, MP3 players, cell phones and other small portable electronics. Stretchy neoprene case protects your electronics while minimizing bulk. Stiff front panel protects your delicate LCD screen. Universal appeal- holds credit cards/money, first aid supplies or whatever else you can dream up. Compact design- easily fits in your pocket, purse or backpack. Detachable wrist strap included. Internal Dimensions: 2.3 x 1 x 3.8" 25 Year Warranty!
title: Case Logic UNZB-2 Compact Camera Case (Black)
